name: Infinite Heroes Card Adventure
description:
Simphony Games presents an adventure card game - Infinite Heroes! Challenge the army of monsters and defeat the Demon. Simple at first glance, the game will present you with difficult tests.

Creatures, artifacts, portals, spells and heroes. Play as a tireless adventurer, a powerful mage, a great warlock, or any of eight heroes for free!

DOWNLOAD THE GAME and join the magical world of Infinite Heroes adventures.

There is no need to build a deck - just choose a hero, join the battle and defeat opponents, considering each next step. Get loot and treasures to win. As you progress, the strength of your opponents will also grow, and in order to win, you will need to think through every step.

PECULIARITIES:

ADVENTURE MODE: choose a hero and defeat all opponents.

FIVE COLORFUL LOCATIONS: the path of the hero lies through snow-capped mountains, a dense forest, a viscous swamp, a hot desert and a fiery volcano.

Gameplay with endless combinations of enemies, treasures and portals create unique conditions in each battle.
